boardInfo.name: Knowledge
boardInfo.description: Knowledge is about acquiring and managing information. Whether it's your contacts or your documents, GDI helps you turn information into knowledge.

boardInfo.name: Productivity
boardInfo.description: Productivity is about managing tasks and workflows.  To efficiently use AI, you need access to the right tools and information at the right time.

boardInfo.name: Content
boardInfo.description: Content is about generating new content. Whether it's writing a blog post, creating a tutorial, or generating an animation, GDI helps you create content with AI.
